titles.title: You Must Be Alive To Vote Act of 2020
You Must Be Alive To Vote Act of 2020
To require States to obtain information from the Social Security Administration on deaths for purposes of voter registration list maintenance, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on House Administration, and in addition to the Committees on Ways and Means, Transportation and Infrastructure, and Education and Labor, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.
